titleStmt.title: The examination and confutation of a certaine scurrilous treatise entituled, The suruey of the newe religion, published by Matthew Kellison, in disgrace of true religion professed in the Church of England
titleStmt.author: Sutcliffe, Matthew, 1550?-1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Allde for Richard Serger and Edmund Weauer, & are to be solde at the great north dore of S. Paules Church,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The reuew and examination of Kellisons scurrilous Suruey.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the great north dore of S. Paules Church
